    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(int size)
        Constructor for Map
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the maze (measured in number of grids in CellGrid. True size of the maze will be size*2+1).

    • Method Detail

      • GenerateMaze

        private int[][] GenerateMaze(int size)
        Calls maze generator to generate maze.

        Randomizes all walls that are not entry or exit walls.

        Parameters:
        size - the size of the maze (measured in number of grids)
        Returns:
        2D Integer array of the maze.
        See Also:
        maze#Generator#generateMaze(size)
